roleset.name: to argue

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Pinnacle West Capital Corp. , which [*T*-1] has been wrangling with regulators for months over what [*] to do [*T*-2] about Pinnacle 's moribund Merabank thrift unit , suspended its dividend and reported a 91 % plunge in third-quarter net income .
example.arg: over what [*] to do [*T*-2] about Pinnacle 's moribund Merabank thrift unit

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls battle-36.4-1. Comparison with 'argue.02'.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wrangle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
